member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_ROTATION
member.summary: The DISPLAYCONFIG_ROTATION enumeration specifies the clockwise rotation of the display.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_ROTATION.DISPLAYCONFIG_ROTATION_IDENTITY
member.summary: Indicates that rotation is 0 degrees—landscape mode.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_ROTATION.DISPLAYCONFIG_ROTATION_ROTATE90
member.summary: Indicates that rotation is 90 degrees clockwise—portrait mode.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_ROTATION.DISPLAYCONFIG_ROTATION_ROTATE180
member.summary: Indicates that rotation is 180 degrees clockwise—inverted landscape mode.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_ROTATION.DISPLAYCONFIG_ROTATION_ROTATE270
member.summary: Indicates that rotation is 270 degrees clockwise—inverted portrait mode.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_ROTATION.DISPLAYCONFIG_ROTATION_FORCE_UINT32
member.summary: Forces this enumeration to compile to 32 bits in size. Without this value, some compilers would allow this enumeration to compile to a size other than 32 bits. You should not use this value.
